title.narrative: (RCCP - Implementation) Reg Climate Change Programme - Implementation Phase

description.narrative: This activity ((RCCP - Implementation) Reg Climate Change Programme - Implementation Phase) is a component of Reg Climate Change Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £4,913,192. This component benefits South of Sahara, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: DAI Europe, HTSPE, IMC Worldwide, KPMG LLP. The start date is 01-02-2007 and the end date is 31-03-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
